message.content:
cs.DC, cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.SY, cs.NE 

The paper discusses the challenges and solutions for distributed data-parallel computation, which is a common topic in distributed computing (cs.DC) and machine learning (cs.LG) research. The use of stochastic algorithms and the focus on reducing synchronization overheads also suggest a connection to algorithms and data structures (cs.DS) research. The NOTIFY-ACK semantics used in ASAP also have similarities to distributed systems (cs.SY) research. Finally, the paper specifically mentions distributed machine learning applications, which falls under the sub-category of neural and evolutionary computing (cs.NE).
